message.content:
cs.PR, cs.ST, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MS

The paper deals with the problem of estimating the probability of a biased coin from a finite number of tosses, which is a classic problem in probability theory and statistics. The paper also discusses the limitations of the standard method and proposes an exact method that is correct for any sample size. Based on this, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.PR (Probability), cs.ST (Statistics), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.MS (Mathematical Statistics).
